metadata.description: Station layout and room definitions for Alien in the Machine
notes: This file defines the 4-room station layout mentioned in PROJECT_PLAN.md
Each room MUST have doors with targetRoomId for connectivity
Future phases will add items, furniture, and environmental objects
Keep this file modular - it should be easy to swap out different station layouts

rooms.name: Docking Bay
rooms.description: A large chamber with massive airlock doors. Emergency lights cast an eerie red glow across scattered cargo containers and maintenance equipment.

doors.description: Heavy blast door leading to the main corridor

rooms.name: Main Corridor
rooms.description: A central hallway connecting the major sections of the station. Flickering overhead lights illuminate worn metal plating and utility pipes running along the walls.

doors.description: Heavy blast door leading to the docking bay
Reinforced door to the bridge - requires security clearance

rooms.name: Medical Bay
rooms.description: A sterile medical facility with examination tables, medical equipment, and supply cabinets. Some equipment appears to have been hastily abandoned.

rooms.name: Command Bridge
rooms.description: The station's nerve center, filled with command consoles, communication equipment, and tactical displays. Multiple screens show various station systems and external views.

doors.description: Reinforced door from the bridge - requires security clearance

stationLayout.name: Research Station Alpha-7
notes: Station is operating on emergency power
Bridge requires security clearance to access
Some areas show signs of hasty evacuation

items.name: Emergency Medical Kit
items.description: A standard emergency medical kit containing bandages, antiseptics, and basic medical supplies.

items.name: Heavy-Duty Flashlight
items.description: A military-grade flashlight with extended battery life.

items.name: Blue Security Keycard
items.description: A blue-level security keycard for accessing restricted areas.

items.name: Research Data Pad
items.description: A damaged data pad with partially corrupted research notes.

furniture.name: Storage Locker A-1
furniture.description: A standard storage locker. The door hangs slightly open.

furniture.name: Medical Supply Cabinet
furniture.description: A white medical cabinet with a red cross symbol. The glass door is intact.

furniture.name: Command Terminal
furniture.description: The main command terminal. The screen flickers occasionally with system warnings.

furniture.name: Maintenance Panel
furniture.description: An open maintenance panel with exposed wiring and diagnostic displays.

furniture.name: Supply Crate
furniture.description: A large metal crate marked 'EMERGENCY SUPPLIES'. One corner is dented.

furniture.name: Debris Pile
furniture.description: A pile of twisted metal and broken equipment. Something might be hidden underneath.
